evoter.server.http.request.interfaces

Interface IQuestionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QuestionService

    public interface IQuestionService
    Interface define all methods to handle requests involving Question
    Author:
    btdiem

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BEAN_NAME

      Create a Question object from input request parameter and insert to question table

      Create Answer object from input request parameter and insert to ANSWER table

      Remove Question of input parameter out the question table

      and update the changes to database

      Keep the SessionID and Question of input request parameter
      Change status of question from 0 to 1 that means the question is sending status

    • Method Detail

      • doGetAll

        java.lang.Object doGetAll(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Select all Question of given Session
        Parameters:
        httpExchange -
        parameters - contains :
        • QuestionSessionDAO.SESSION_ID
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        Question.toJSON() array and Answer.toJSON() array
        if session has question

      • doView

        java.lang.Object doView(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Select the information of the given question
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        QuestionDAO.ID
        Returns:
        an Question.toJSON() and Answer.toJSON() array
        if question can be found

      • doCreate

        java.lang.Object doCreate(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Create a Question object from input request parameter and insert to question table
        Create an QuestionSession object and insert to QUESTION_SESSION table
        Create Answer object from input request parameter and insert to ANSWER table
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains:
        • QuestionDAO.QUESTION_TEXT is a string array QuestionDAO.QUESTION_TYPE_ID QuestionDAO.CREATION_DATE UserDAO.USER_KEY QuestionSessionDAO.SESSION_ID; AnswerDAO.ANSWER_TEXT is a string array
        Returns:
        success message if creating and inserting successfully

      • doDelete

        java.lang.Object doDelete(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Remove Question of input parameter out the question table
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains:
        QuestionDAO.ID UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        success message if deleting successfully

      • doSend

        java.lang.Object doSend(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Keep the SessionID and Question of input request parameter
        Change status of question from 0 to 1 that means the question is sending status
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains:
        • QuestionDAO.ID : question id is sending QuestionSessionDAO.SESSION_ID : current session ID UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        success message if the given question of request parameter is found and change status of question successfully

      • doGetLatest

        java.lang.Object doGetLatest(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Send client the question that has sending status (status value is 1)
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains:
        • QuestionSessionDAO.SESSION_ID
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        an Question.toJSON() and Answer.toJSON() array

      • doStopSend

        java.lang.Object doStopSend(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Stop sending question to clients and change status of sending question from 1 to 2
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains :
        QuestionSessionDAO.SESSION_ID
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        success message if there is no exception
        Otherwise @return failure message
        This method is called when receiving URIRequest.STOP_SEND_QUESTION

      • doEdit

        java.lang.Object doEdit(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Change question text value of given question from input parameter request
        and update the changes to database
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains:
        • UserDAO.USER_KEY
        QuestionDAO.ID
        QuestionDAO.QUESTION_TEXT
        Returns:
        success message if there is no exception
        Otherwise @return a failure message
        This method is called when receiving URIRequest.UPDATE_QUESTION

      • addSentQuestion

        void addSentQuestion(long sessionId,
                   evoter.share.model.Question question)
        Keep question of sending question request of teacher user
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the current session id
        question - question is sent by client requests

      • removeSentQuestion

        evoter.share.model.Question removeSentQuestion(long sessionId)
        Remove the sending question
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the current active session
        Returns:
        Question sending question

      • canSendQuestion

        boolean canSendQuestion(long sessionId)
        Parameters:
        sessionId - id the current active session
        Returns:
        true if there is an sending status question
